title: Expectation
description: Buyer-facing fulfillment expectation representing logical groupings of items (e.g., 'package'). Can be split, merged, or adjusted post-order to set buyer expectations for when/how items arrive.

quantity.description: Quantity of this item in this expectation.

line_items.description: Which line items and quantities are in this expectation.

description.description: Human-readable delivery description (e.g., 'Arrives in 5-8 business days').

fulfillable_on.description: When this expectation can be fulfilled: 'now' or ISO 8601 timestamp for future date (backorder, pre-order).
